greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of asymmetric forests with n nodes.
reference: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, p. 301 and 562.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for sequences related to forests
maple: h:= proc(n) option remember; g(n)-add(g(i)*g(n-i), i=0..n)/2
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n==0, 1, If[i<1, 0, Sum[Binomial[b[i-1, i-1], j]*b[n-i*j, i-1], {j, 0, n/i}]]]; g[n_] := b[n-1, n-1]; h[n_] := h[n] = g[n] - Sum[g[i]*g[n-i], {i, 0, n}]/2 - If[Mod[n, 2]==1, 0, g[n/2]]/2; f[n_, i_] := f[n, i] = If[n==0, 1, If[i<1, 0, Sum[Binomial[h[i], j]*f[n - i*j, i-1], {j, 0, n/i}]]]; a[n_] := f[n, n]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 40}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 21 2016, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, Oct 15 1998
